// src/components/AboutUs.jsx import React from "react"; import "./AboutUs.css"; import chefPhoto from "../assets/chef.png"; // Add your chef's image here const AboutUs = () => { return (

About Us

Welcome to Nature's Plate! We believe in bringing fresh, organic, and healthy food straight from nature to your table. Our mission is to serve delicious meals that nourish both the body and the soul.

About the Chef

Chef John Doe is a culinary artist with over 20 years of experience in the kitchen. He is passionate about creating healthy, wholesome meals that inspire joy and well-being. Trained in top kitchens around the world, he brings his global culinary experience to every dish at Nature's Plate.

); }; export default AboutUs;
